entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
